/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many urban areas. The street itself is lined with trees and shrubs, adding a touch of greenery to the concrete jungle. A few cars and buses can be seen on the road, hinting at the city's active life. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
